cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the security configuration to fail and prevent proper data encryption.

du.explanation_en: Setting the MAC layer log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the MAC layer logging subsystem to fail initialization and prevent proper MAC layer event logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將 MAC 層日誌級別設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致 MAC 層日誌子系統初始化失敗，並阻止正確的 MAC 層事件記錄。
